## IChartDef interface

A chart definition that is suitable for serialization to JSON and transfer to the browser via REST API. Can be used to instantiate a chart in the browser.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface IChartDef 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [axisMap](./chart-def.ichartdef.axismap.md) | [IAxisMap](./chart-def.iaxismap.md) | Maps fields in the data to axis' on the chart. |
|  [data](./chart-def.ichartdef.data.md) | [ISerializedData](./serialization.iserializeddata.md) | JSON serializable representation of the data. |
|  [plotConfig](./chart-def.ichartdef.plotconfig.md) | [IPlotConfig](./chart-def.iplotconfig.md) | Defines the look of the chart. |
